no. debugging through the code i think sabredav gobbled the xml body of the lock request and somehow still called the put methods of the file / directory node implementations. checking the content length then triggered the badrequest error. i fixed it by only checking the content length when it's really a put request.
yes. would be cool. but will need some testing before release.
one thing: the ox_mtime should also work for the chunked file upload, is that possible? we will add the same mtime simply to every chunk.
